content: minecraft axolotls note this pattern doesn t need to be made with the specified yarn and hook size you can use any yarn weight just adjust your hook size accordingly the pattern and tutorial is available here https //youtu be/q8uy9vzghre pattern details hook size correct size for yarn yarn any terms us difficulty advanced beginner finished size depends on yarn weight/hook size materials & supplies to make this pattern you will need yarn scissors needle stitch markers stuffing optional items for blocking
